sentences.sContent: Mrs Lynn Smith, prosecuting, said the offence took place on January 27.
sentences.sCn: 控方律师林恩·史密斯夫人称案件发生于1月27日。

synos.tran: 检举；贯彻；从事；依法进行

remMethod.val: pro (代理) + secu (跟随) + te → 代理他人对…提起公诉 → 起诉

words.tran: 检察官；公诉人；[法] 起诉人；实行者

trans.tranCn: 检举；贯彻；从事；依法进行
trans.tranOther: if a lawyer prosecutes a case, he or she tries to prove that the person charged with a crime is guilty
